attributes.long-description:
Foosball 2012 + DLC Bundle

Enjoy multiplayer foosball matches with up to 4 players, dominate the online leaderboards, or become a global champion in single-player World Tour mode.

Use PlayStation®Move motion controller for realistic and precise controls, or play with the DUALSHOCK®3 wireless controller and its innovative controls.

The Cross-Play feature will let you play against other players on both PlayStation®3 system and PlayStation®Vita system, while cross-saving will let you continue playing the game on your PlayStation®Vita system where you left off on PS3™!

Whether you enjoy foosball regularly or have played it only briefly before, this game’s addictiveness and competitiveness will captivate you.

- Local & Online multiplayer for up to 4 players.
- PlayStation®Move motion controller support for realistic gameplay and precise DUALSHOCK®3 controls.
- 9 different tables, 6 balls, and dozens of customization options.
- Full cross-compatibility with PlayStation®Vita system.



1-4 players
256KB minimum save size
SIXAXIS Motion Sensitive
HDTV screen resolution: 720p, 1080i, 1080p
DUALSHOCK®3
Network Features
Network Players 2-3
PlayStation®Eye camera optional
PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye camera optional
PlayStation®Move navigation controller or Wireless Controller optional.

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.

GRIP DIGITAL S.R.O. & 3DIVISION S.R.O., 2012
PlayStation®Move features require PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye (sold separately).
attributes.name: Foosball 2012 Ultimate Foosball Bundle
